newsitem.title: USA: AirMedia releases personal portfolio software.
newsitem.headline: AirMedia releases personal portfolio software.

text.p: AirMedia Inc said Wednesday it released its Personal Portfolio software for its Internet broadcast network.
AirMedia also said Microsoft Corp will integrate AirMedia technology and wireless services, including the new Personal Portfolio, into Microsoft's Internet Explorer 4.0 and the Active Desktop.

The software "listens" to the constant, almost real-time broadcast of financial information from the company's wireless network and then delivers stock prices, alerts to changes in price levels and late-breaking news customized to a subscriber's portfolio.
The company said the information arrives through a wireless receiver, even when the subscriber's modem is not connected.
